About us
Global Partner has founded in 2013, our head office in Warsaw, Poland. We are fully registered EU company and our focus on high-quality and Bio fresh CERTIFIED food products (Vegetables & Fruits). The most of our products are coming from Egypt
Our Vision
To compete with the leading internationally recognized suppliers of agricultural fresh goods by the end of the year 2024.

Primary focus is importing a variety of top-quality and Bio fruits and vegetables from top partner producers around the world from trusted partners.

The abundant harvests and seasonality of the goods would ensure the competitiveness of the price and quality of the product.

Expand import list to include processed (frozen and dried) products from different markets into the EU market, including Onions, Garlic, artichokes, mangoes and strawberries, to ensure sustainability.

Expand our Bio offerings and products which is inline with EU end customers aspirations and EU vision.
Why Global Partner…?
- We are focused, experienced and Global Partner is focused on the market gaps and challenges, if you have one of the following, targets, objectives or challenges then Global Partner is the right.
- Want to Introduce a new product line?
- Have quality and commercial worries dealing directly with foreign exports and producers?
- Want to maintain continuous supply for special products all year long (for example Sweet Potato)?
- Want to build strong and continuous annual supply contracts with producers and exporters?
- Want to invest in your own farms and production lines abroad (Poland, Egypt)?
- Your are into processed food business and more interested in class-2-3 products?
- You have special packing needs or requirements?
